title: Fuzzy Constraint-Based Parameter Programming Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Programming Knowledge, Optimization Problem Comprehension, and Fuzzy Logic Fundamentals
context.additional_context: A course focused on acquiring practical parameter optimization techniques, fostering the ability to solve complex problems through ANFIS-based fuzzy constraint learning.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically model fuzzy constraints by applying deductive learning principles.
Learners can learn constraint sets of parameterized programming problems and derive optimal solutions using ANFIS.
Learners can design flexible models for practical problems by applying similarity-based constraint clustering and generalization techniques.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
